heading: Risk Timeline
lineOfTolerance.title: Line of Tolerance
name: Name

errorMessages.nameTooLong: Name must be at most 256 characters long
errorMessages.textTooLong: Text must be at most 65535 characters long
errorMessages.noConnectionFound: No connection found for this component.
errorMessages.noCommunicationInterfaceFound: The selected communication interface was not found for this component.
errorMessages.userConnectionInvalid: Users can only connect to clients, servers, or databases
errorMessages.componentToUserInvalid: Only clients, servers, or databases can connect to users
errorMessages.componentToCommunicationInfraInvalid: Clients, servers, and databases can only connect to communication infrastructure via communication interfaces
errorMessages.communicationInfraToComponentInvalid: Communication infrastructure can only connect to clients, servers, or databases via communication interfaces

1.name: extremely unlikely
1.description: Only attackers on the level of state secret services can realise the attack or several highly unlikely events not under control of the attacker have to occur together.

2.name: rather unlikely
2.description: Only attackers with much time and/or money can realise the threat or unlikely events not under control of the attacker need to occur.

3.name: possible
3.description: The threat can only be realised by serious attackers with considerable criminal energy and in-depth knowledge.

4.name: probable
4.description: An attacker needs only intent, but no more knowledge than what can be derived from internet research (alike "script kiddies").

5.name: almost certain
5.description: The threat can occur unintentionally, e.g. during regular usage by a non-malicious user.

2.name: noticeable
2.description: Can easily be compensated (e.g. within the organisation not using a dedicated project, without noteworthy cutback in other activities, with limited financial effort, ...).

3.name: quite noticeable
3.description: Can only be compensated with effort (e.g. by postponing other projects, with considerable financial resources or expenditure of time, ...)

4.name: threatening
4.description: For the market position of the company

5.name: very threatening
5.description: For the existence of the company
